channel.title: rock around the clock
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "rock around the clock" - team of 4?

item.title: Re: rock around the clock
item.content:encoded: Not just the Sound 4, but Bones too â€¦ after all, he's levelled by it as well.

item.title: Re: rock around the clock
item.content:encoded:
As often as you want. The only requirment for unlocking Rock Around the Clock is to have any of the Sound Four in team. 1 member is enough.

A good idea for the Bones mission is to learn Tubby 2's jutsu that gives 5 tai successes or use his lvl 1 range jutsu.

item.title: Re: rock around the clock
item.content:encoded: how often can i do this mission? i did it a few days ago but failed to get bones (sooo hard!) and now i don't see the rock around the clock special mission anymore.

item.title: Re: rock around the clock
item.content:encoded: You need do this 2 times with different allies to get Bones mission.

item.title: rock around the clock
item.content:encoded: do i have to repeat the mission so i can get all 4 sounds up to level 2? or is there a better way of doing it so i can get bones?
